title: Quick Question about Taric
body:
Hello all,

I'm still pretty new to buying champions, and since I have the original Taric {{champion:44}} and now there is going to be a reworked Taric, will I have to rebuy the champion again? And will the skins stay the same RP price? 

Hypee

replies.body: You won't need to purchase anything.
{{champion:44}} **Taric** and all his skins will remain the same price. You wont have to re-purchase him either!
